Package strategy

Class PlayerStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • strategy.PlayerStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aggresive, Benevolent, Cheater, HumanPlayer, RandomPlayer
    public abstract class PlayerStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class that is implemented by concrete strategy classes This is the class that declares the method to be implemented by the various strategies.
